name: Los Muertos - Shoot the Walking Dead
name_original: Los Muertos - Shoot the Walking Dead
description:
When your town is overrun by the walking dead, there's only one thing left to do - cut down wave after wave of zombies in this endless shooting adventure! Los Muertos combines the timeless appeal of classic arcade games with stunning graphics and sound you have to see to believe.

How to play
- Touch left screen to Jump
- Touch right screen to Shoot
- Run as far as possible
- Get coins to unlock new weapons
